short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Feyisa Berisa This extension enforce Chrome/Chromium to go Incognito mode if url tagged with /Justme modified from always-incognito

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is modified version of Always incognito , this chrome extension is an extension that works with trigger tag , and with adding trigger tag  it will open the url in incognito. This is modified by  Feyisa Berisa.

User have always have to remember to go to chrome setting to go to incognito , But with this extension will help users to easily go to incognito by just using specific trigger tag and they don't have to go to the settings.
